titleStmt.title: URFA-012
SHAWI Corpus
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 33574

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.

u.seg: hāḏi mayyit al-barāǧ hāḏi – hāḏi mayyt al-barāǧ - – hāḏi mayyit al-barāč.
yḥuṭṭūn, w-min hēne tgūm ᵊtkubb yisǧūn al-ˁadas bī
baˁda šahar uxṛa yisḥabūn yinṭūn-u mayye ta-mā yības
al-mayye ṣārat al-ˁadas vērmu yṣīr zēn
al-xams ᵊṭwān, al-kīlōw yiǧi xamsa w-ˁišrīn kīlo
xams ᵊṭwān yiǧi l-ˁadas ˀač-čēl, ˀaṯnaˁaš dönüm
iṯnaˁaš dönem čēl nsammī b-al-ˁarab, čēl ᵊngūl
ˀal-ḥunṭa ybīˁūn-he, al-ˁadas, al-ˁadas čēl-u mītēn kīlow
w-al-ˁadas ˁamanu ṯiǧīl, čēlu mītēn kīlow
al-ḥunṭa mīye w-arbaˁa w ṯiamānīn kīlow
Ēh šōk, hāḏa yiṭlaʕ yabanǧı madda
hāḏa ʕušub ngūl lu iḥna ʕušub hāḏa
hāḏa ˀaš-šōk hāḏa hnīt-u hāḏi baˁdēn
bī-hum awwali yāklūn-he zād amma ˀiḥna mā-nākul-he
šwayy yiṣīr guṭma hīčiḏ ḥāmḏ̣e ḥilwa
ᵊb-gaḷb al-ˁadas fazla mā yṣīr ˁaman yiṭuššūn ilāč
